title: NSFW- funny story about my mole on my butt and a hookup
body:
NSFW, sexual content

I just had a realization that made me literally laugh out loud and wanted to share it in case anyone else finds it funny. 

I hooked up with this guy last night. It was our first encounter, had a good time. We decided to go again this morning, with (obviously) day light. I was bent over the bed, and there was a point where I thought he was attempting to put a finger in my butt.  He touched near the area a few times but didn’t go in. I made a mental note that if we hangout again to mention that I’m not really into butt stuff, and we kept at it. 

Flash forward to my being at home and thinking about it. I remembered that I have a mole by my butthole, my butthole mole if you will. I realized he wasn’t trying to play with my butt. He had been trying to clean what I can only assume he thought was a poorly wiped ass, only for him to realize it was indeed just a mole. 

(I had a similar revelation once. I learned about my butthole mole because years ago a previous hookup and I had made a video. I watched it and asked him why he would’ve taken the video and not inform me of the fleck of poop and have me clean myself first. He said “it’s always there.. it’s your butthole mole” and shared that the first time he noticed it, he also thought it was poop. I am now wondering how many people have seen my butthole mole and just thought I was nasty and didn’t clean myself properly lol.)
author: Flaky-Spare680
